title: The Accusation
caption: A lamb drinks peacefully. A wolf approaches, teeth bared. He falsely accuses the lamb of muddying the water. Might tries to justify itself. But injustice is easily seen.
prompt: A picturesque stream with a fluffy white lamb drinking downstream. A large, menacing grey wolf stands upstream, glaring down at the lamb. Focus on the size difference and the contrast between the lamb's innocence and the wolf's aggression. Use a slightly desaturated color palette to emphasize the grim atmosphere.

title: Fabricated Excuse
caption: The wolf shifts his excuse. He claims the lamb insulted him last year. Power creates reasons, even absurd ones. The lamb's helplessness highlights the injustice. There is no real defense against prejudice.
prompt: Close-up on the wolf's snarling face. His eyes are narrowed and filled with malice. Focus on the exaggeration of his expression, making him appear unreasonable and cruel. The background is blurred, drawing attention to the wolf's distorted features.

title: The Inevitable Outcome
caption: The lamb protests his innocence, in vain. The wolf dismisses his pleas. Strength dictates the outcome. Justice is absent when power is unchecked. Might makes right, but it doesn't make it just.
prompt: The lamb looking up at the wolf with pleading eyes, mouth slightly open as if speaking. The wolf towers over him, casting a long shadow. Use soft lighting on the lamb and harsh lighting on the wolf to further emphasize the power imbalance.

title: Taking Advantage
caption: The wolf lunges at the lamb, a swift and unfair attack. Innocence is no shield against brutality. The lamb's vulnerability is heartbreaking. Sometimes, strength is simply abuse.
prompt: Action shot of the wolf leaping towards the lamb. The lamb is frozen in fear, eyes wide with terror. Capture the dynamism of the wolf's movement and the lamb's vulnerability. A sense of impending doom should permeate the image.

title: The Unjust End
caption: The lamb lies defeated. The wolf stands triumphant. Might prevails, but at what cost? True strength lies in fairness, not force. Injustice leaves a lasting scar.
prompt: The lamb lying on the ground, defeated. The wolf stands over him, a look of cold satisfaction on his face. The background is barren and desolate, symbolizing the emptiness of the wolf's victory.

title: Empty Justification
caption: A close-up on the wolf, panting. His shadow stretches long and distorted. He believes he's won, but his victory is hollow. Cruelty creates emptiness within.
prompt: A stark, low-angle shot of the wolf. Focus on the harsh lines of his face and the shadows that accentuate his predatory features. He should look strong but also somehow empty or unfulfilled.

title: The Silent Witness
caption: A solitary tree stands witness to the event. It represents impartial observation. Nature sees all, but cannot intervene. The world is often a silent accomplice to injustice.
prompt: A lone, ancient oak tree overlooking the stream. The scene with the wolf and lamb is visible in the distance, but slightly blurred. The tree is gnarled and weathered, suggesting it has seen many similar events.

title: A Ripple Effect
caption: The stream, once clear, is now disturbed. The wolf's actions pollute more than just the water. Injustice has far-reaching consequences. One act can poison the whole.
prompt: A close-up shot of the stream water. The water is murky and disturbed, with ripples spreading outwards. Focus on the visual representation of disruption and the loss of clarity.

title: The Echo of Injustice
caption: The wind whispers through the grass, carrying the tale. The story of the lamb and the wolf lingers. Lessons of fairness must be learned. Justice delayed is justice denied.
prompt: Wind blowing through a field of tall grass. The sky is overcast, creating a sense of melancholy. The focus should be on the movement of the grass and the feeling of a somber, enduring tale being told.

title: Moral of the Story
caption: The final frame should be simple. A single image. The takeaway: Might doesn't make right. True strength lies in kindness and fairness. Choose compassion over power.
prompt: A set of scales, balanced perfectly. One side has a feather representing gentleness, the other side has a small rock representing strength. Both are equally weighted, signifying that true strength lies in balance and fairness.
